Identifying potential recruits for real.solution_summary: Use AI tools like corded.io to identify agents likely to switch brokerages.

Finding clients as a new agent.solution_summary: Attend community events regularly to build relationships and visibility.

Generating leads in a new market.solution_summary: Kristee suggests holding open houses and working rentals to build relationships and generate leads.

Establishing rapport and trust in negoti.solution_summary: Use AI to gather information about the other party to find commonalities and build rapport.

Handling conflict during negotiations.solution_summary: Utilize AI to analyze interactions and flag potential conflicts, allowing for timely interventions.

Lack of effective data utilization in re.solution_summary: Agents should leverage MLS data with AI tools for better market insights and client service.

Staying motivated during slow periods.solution_summary: Focus on feeling lucky and grateful for the opportunity to help clients.

Pressure of perfectionism in real estate.solution_summary: Recognizing the unrealistic standards set by social media and focusing on personal satisfaction.

Balancing work and personal life in real.solution_summary: Kristee emphasizes the importance of being available for clients at all times and viewing work as an honor rather than a burden.

Over-reliance on buying leads.solution_summary: Shift focus to relationship-building and referrals for sustainable growth.

The relevance and necessity of NAR in 20.solution_summary: NAR should focus on lobbying, data analysis, creating a national MLS, and setting higher standards for REALTORS.

Competitive housing market stress.solution_summary: Understanding the emotional drivers and pressures of buyers to better navigate client relationships.

Building a luxury brand while being appr.solution_summary: Kristee maintains a luxury brand by using professional marketing materials and being open to working with clients at all price points.
